Abigail: Aku sebenarnya benci harus menari dihadapan orang... Itu memalukan.#$e#Ibu yang memaksaku.$u
Robin: Ahh... Udara jadi sejuk karena bunga-bunga ini.$h
Demetrius: Tarian musim semi ini dulunya adalah ritual kuno untuk upacara kesuburan.#$e#Hei... Petani seharusnya tahu soal ini.
Maru: Aku suka menari, tapi tradisi ini menurutku agak kaku. Tapi sepertinya orang tua menyukai tradisi ini.
Linus: Oh, halo. Senang bisa bicara denganmu.#$b#Musim semi hampir selesai... sayang sekali.
Pierre: Apa! Bagaimana kamu bisa berada di belakang sini?$u#$b#Jangan sentuh apa-apa.
Caroline: Andai saja Pierre lebih mementingkan waktu bersama keluarga daripada jualan...$s
George: Bunga? Aku tidak bisa melihatnya.#$e#Di sini terlalu terang!
Evelyn: Aku membuat hiasan bunganya selama seminggu. Apa kamu suka?
Lewis: Kalau mau ikut berdansa, carilah pasanganmu.
Clint: Aku penasaran apakah Emily mau menari denganku?
Pam: Ini baru namanya hidup... Wine manis, suara air mengalir, udara yang hangat... Apa aku sudah menyebutkan wine?
Emily: Wahhh... Aku kenyang. Hei, Apa kau sudah mencoba jeli merahnya?
Haley: Aku sedang berlatih menari... pokoknya nanti harus sempurna.#$e#Aku sudah jadi Ratu Bunga selama 5 tahun dan aku belum mau menyerahkan gelar itu pada orang lain!
Jodi: Apa kamu akan berdansa hari ini, @?$h
Kent: Tanah luas seperti ini... membuatku gugup.#$e#*berbisik*Kent. Pikirkan hal menyenangkan. Pikirkan hal menyenangkan.
Leah: Hai @. Senang bisa bertemu denganmu disini.$h
Shane: Mmm... sausnya enak. *sruput*#$e#Ah, benda hijau ini tenyata pedas! *nyam*#$b#*kriuk* ...ow.$s
Marnie: *hahh*... Cinta di udara... dan aku masih sendiri.$s
Elliott: Aku pakai kemeja terbaikku untuk dansa... Hal seperti ini jarang terjadi!
Dwarf: Di permukaan sedang hujan katamu? *hahh*#$e#Hujan... Itu hal mistis bagi kami. Banyak dari kami yang tidak pernah melihat hujan di hidupnya.
Harvey: Aku sedang mengumpulkan keberanian untuk mengajak seseorang berdansa denganku.$11
Sandy: Aku dengar sedang hujan di rumah. Apa karena itu kamu datang kesini?$h#$e#Aku jadi merindukan hujan...$s
Jas: Suatu hari nanti, aku akan jadi Ratu Bunga!
Vincent: Tidak adil... Kenapa aku tidak boleh jadi Ratu Bunga?
Leo: Dibandingkan rumahku, bunga-bunga di sini sangat cantik, tapi kurang bewarna!$h#$e#Apa kelak aku boleh ikut menari juga...$u
set-up_y2: event1/22 22/farmer 76 17 1/changeToTemporaryMap Forest-FlowerFestival2/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Jas true 3 620 4 620 1 620 2 620/advancedMove Vincent true 0 4 2 0 0 -4 -2 0/advancedMove Haley true 0 1 2 3000 2 0 0 -1 -2 0 3 500 4 500 1 500 2 500 2 0 1 500 2 500 3 500 4 500 0 2 0 -2 -2 0/advancedMove Alex true 4 12500 1 2000/advancedMove Gus true 4 8000 -2 0 3 400 4 6000 2 0 4 1000/advancedMove Elliott true 4 14500 1 2350/advancedMove Emily true 2 2000 1 1200 1 0 3 1750 4 650 3 600 2 500 1 675 4 1000 0 -1 4 1250 3 600 2 600 1 600 4 600 3 1000 -1 0 3 1000 2 800 1 800 4 800 3 800 2 2000 0 1 2 2000 1 500 2 500 3 500 4 500 1 500 2 500/positionOffset Sebastian -6 -20/positionOffset Leah -24 10/positionOffset Clint -12 24/positionOffset Caroline -12 12/positionOffset Jodi 16 6/positionOffset Robin -6 12/positionOffset Kent? -12 24/positionOffset Marlon -16 0/positionOffset Penny -20 -9/positionOffset Sam 6 12/positionOffset Shane 12 -12/playerControl flowerFestival/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
Abigail_spouse_y2: We don't have to dance if you don't want to!$1
Penny_spouse_y2: I could imagine us moving to a spot like this, someday.$h
Leah_spouse_y2: We should go hiking in these woods someday! I bet there's mushrooms...
Haley_spouse_y2: Today is the big day! We'll be the centerpiece of the whole dance!$1
Maru_spouse_y2: I didn't practice much beforehand but I'll give it my best for the both of us.$0
Emily_spouse_y2: Hey, I was wondering what you were up to!$0
Harvey_spouse_y2: I wore my best tie for the occasion.$4
Alex_spouse_y2: Hey, I'm feeling pretty good about today. We'll do great during the ceremony... just follow my lead.$0
Sam_spouse_y2: Whoa, you look really great today.$0
Sebastian_spouse_y2: You're the only reason I came all the way out here...$1
Shane_spouse_y2: *burp* I might've eaten too much to dance... sorry.$0
Abigail_y2: They should make the seniors dance this year. I bet they'd love it!
Robin_y2: Is that the smell of flowers? Or is it Caroline's perfume?$0
Demetrius_y2: Gatherings like this give a sense of identity to our community.#$b#Or as my wife says... 'it makes the town lively'!
Maru_y2: It can be a little nerve-racking to ask someone to dance with you.$0
Sebastian_y2: I didn't come here by choice.$0
Linus_y2: Did you have a successful salmonberry harvest?$0#$b#I picked enough to make a sweet and tangy jelly! I brought some today for everyone to taste.$1
Pierre_y2: Hey, you shouldn't be back here!$3#$e#Well, if you're sticking around... mind manning the booth for a while? I want to taste Linus' sweet and tangy jelly.#$e#I'm joking, I can't bear to be away from the register...$2
Caroline_y2: I'd ask my husband to dance, but he doesn't really know how.$0
Alex_y2: The key to dancing is to have confidence.$1
George_y2: Flowers? More like bumblebee magnets. Hmph. Can't smell much anyway.$0
Evelyn_y2: I used to visit this spot when I was younger. It hasn't changed much over the years.$0
Lewis_y2: Good afternoon, @. The weather for today's festivities couldn't be more perfect.$0#$b#Come talk to me when you're ready to start the ceremony.$0
Clint_y2: *sigh* Everyone is partnered up... and here I am alone, once again...$2#$e#Ah well... I'll just drown my sorrows with some of that sweet and tangy jelly.
Penny_y2: Vincent asked me to dance with him. Isn't that cute?$0
Pam_y2: The red jelly wafting in the wind looks like it's dancing!$1#$e#Heh... Maybe that's just the wine speaking.$0
Emily_y2: Oh, hey! This year I'm giving my sister competition for the flower queen title.$0#$b#I've been working on my choreography!$1
Haley_y2: One, two, three... one, two, three... Oh, hi. I'm a little busy.$0
Jodi_y2: I have special earrings I only wear once a year for this event.$0#$e#They're little daffodils... see?$h
Kent_y2: Do you ever wonder... why do we find flowers beautiful?#$e#If Jodi and I ever have a daughter, maybe we'll name her after a flower.$h
Marlon_y2: Hmm. Thought I saw something moving across the water.$0
Sam_y2: *sniff* I'd enjoy this get-together more if it wasn't for my allergies. I'll just have to suck it up!$0
Leah_y2: I really feel connected with nature this far away from town.$0
Shane_y2: I couldn't find any clean shirts so this one has to do.$0
Marnie_y2: This open field is perfect grazing land for livestock, wouldn't you agree?$0#$e#Psst... I think Lewis is going to ask me to dance with him!$1
Elliott_y2: To dance among a whimsical backdrop of flowers is an uplifting experience.$1
Gus_y2: Have you tried the dandelion salad? I prepared it fresh right here!$0
Dwarf_y2: You say it's raining up above?#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard_y2: Hmm? How did you climb up here?$0
Harvey_y2: If you spend some time pondering the hardships of life, it can put things into perspective.$0#$b#Suddenly, dancing in front of the whole town in an ill-fitting suit doesn't seem so bad!$h
Sandy_y2: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Vincent_y2: If there's a flower queen... there must be a flower king!$0
Willy_y2: Aye, these waters be teeming with big fish. Shame I didn't bring me rod!$0
Leo_y2: You need a partner to participate in the dance? Does a bird count?$0
